nav.uploadWideLogo: Téléchargez un logo large dans les paramètres de marque

hero.title: Beautiful Flowcharts,
hero.subtitle: Built for Developers
hero.description: Create stunning flowcharts with code or canvas. Export to any format. Open source and free forever.
hero.description4: 100% free, open-source diagram tool for builders. Write code or drag and drop — get beautiful results either way.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Traditional flowchart tools are either too complex or too limited.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: OpenFlowKit combines the best of both worlds.

demo.title: Simple for sketching.
demo.subtitle: Ready for production.
demo.description: Sketch your ideas fast. Export them production-ready.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.subtitle: Create your first flowchart in seconds.

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the OpenFlowKit Team

home.title: Tableau de bord
home.startFromScratch: Commencer de zéro ou importer un diagramme existant.

welcome.title: OpenFlowKit
welcome.description: Concevez de beaux diagrammes structurés avec un canevas orienté développeur.
welcome.privacy: Vos diagrammes, clés API et données restent localement sur votre appareil.
welcome.analytics: Nous ne comptons que les visites anonymes.

features.automatedLayouts: Mises en page automatisées et thèmes professionnels.
features.localFirst: Une architecture locale garde vos données en sécurité.

pricing.title: Premium features.
pricing.subtitle: Zero dollar price tag.
pricing.description: OpenFlowKit is 100% open source. There is no "Enterprise Edition" hidden behind a sales call.
pricing.fullAccess: Full access to the core engine.
pricing.hostAnywhere: Host it anywhere. Modify it freely.
pricing.noAccount: No account or credit card required

features.saveLocally: Save locally, your data stays on your device
features.aiGeneration: AI diagram generation (bring your own API key)

cta.joinUs: Join us in building the next generation of visual tools. Open source, local-first, and forever free.

problem.title: Why do diagrams
problem.subtitle: always feel like a chore?
problem.description: We're designing complex systems with tools built for arts and crafts.
problem.pixelPurgatoryDesc: Wasting hours aligning boxes by hand. One new service breaks your entire layout.
problem.screenshotTrapDesc: Docs drift the moment you take the screenshot. Static assets are dead assets.
problem.enterpriseBeigeDesc: Locked into rigid, generic templates. Your architecture is unique; your diagrams shouldn't look like clipart.

solution.title: Everything you need.
solution.subtitle: Nothing you don't.
solution.description: The ultimate white-label canvas. Fully customizable nodes, edges, and themes — powered by React Flow. It's your brand, given infinite space to breathe.
solution.diagramAsCodeDesc: First-class support for Mermaid.js and our type-safe DSL. Define your architecture in code, export as JSON, and let the engine handle the layout.
solution.flowpilotAIDesc: Chat with your diagram. "Make the corners rounder", "Add a load balancer".
solution.addRedisCache: Add a Redis cache in front of the DB.
solution.localPrivateDesc: We don't want your data. Everything stays on your machine. No cloud saves, no tracking, no "syncing" to our servers. You have full freedom.
solution.amazingAestheticsDesc: Break free from "Enterprise Beige". Fully customizable fonts, colors, and shapes. Create diagrams that look like art, not documentation.

workflows.title: One engine.
workflows.subtitle: Three native workflows.
workflows.description: OpenFlowKit adapts to the tool you are already using. No new tabs to open. No context switching.
workflows.engineeringDesc: Write diagrams in our DSL or Mermaid.js syntax. Paste code, get a fully laid-out diagram. Export as JSON to version control.
workflows.designDesc: Stop rebuilding screens. Copy from the canvas and paste into Figma as editable SVG and text layers.
workflows.exportShareDesc: Export diagrams as SVG, PNG, or PDF. Copy to clipboard and paste into Figma with editable layers. Save as JSON to share or version control.

figma.title: Copy the code.
figma.subtitle: Paste the design.
figma.description: Copy a diagram from OpenFlowKit and paste it straight into Figma — you'll get editable text and clean vector shapes, not a flat image. No plugins needed.

testimonials.title: Build in public.
testimonials.subtitle: Shape the engine.
testimonials.description: OpenFlowKit is just getting started. We are building the core engine in the open. Join us on Day 1.
testimonials.openSourceDesc: The core engine is MIT licensed. Read the source, submit PRs, or fork it for your internal tools.

chatbot.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm the {appName} AI assistant. I have access to the complete documentation. How can I help you today?

settingsModal.shortcutsHint: You can also press ? to view these anytime.

privacy.manifestoText: We believe in privacy by design and user autonomy. We don't collect your email, we don't have a login system, and we don't store your data on our servers.
privacy.anonymousStatsDesc: We only track visits and limited anonymous feature usage (like exports) to improve the tool. We do not track your names, IP addresses, inputs, or diagram content.
privacy.quote: We rely on you to tell us what works, rather than tracking your every move.
privacy.shareFeedbackDesc: Give feedback, report bugs, and ask for features
